original_text: Do not listen to the words of the prophets who are saying to you, ‘You shall not serve the king of Babylon,’ for it is a lie that they are prophesying to you.
korean_text: 그러므로 당신들은 바벨론의 왕을 섬기게 되지 아니하리라 하는 선지자의 말을 듣지 마소서 그들은 거짓을 예언함이니이다

sentences.original_text: Do not listen to the words of the prophets
‘You shall not serve the king of Babylon’
that they are prophesying to you
